{{Wired embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD M11 |revision=(RBM11G) |asin= |price=39 |est_release_date=10/2017 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=new |type=router |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |pwr_v=10-30 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621A |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, SIM Card slot |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_m.2_num= |jtag=yes,, |serial=yes,, |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=3G/LTE modem supports, heatsink, |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS;Level 4; |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui_eth=6C:3B:6B }} {{TagLine|Gigabit Ethernet Router}} :[https://mikrotik.com/product/m11g Product page] :[https://i.mt.lv/routerboard/files/M11G-171019130926.pdf Datasheet]
"MikroTik M11" and "routerboard.com" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|MikroTik}} *[http://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/MikroTik_News News on '''MikroTik''' Wiki] <!-- ===Forum threads=== * [http://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=113068 ''MikroTik RouterBOARD RB750Gr3'' on '''MikroTik''' forums] :[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX v3 (RB750Gr3)]] ''Gigabit Ethernet Router'' :[http://routerboard.com/RB750Gr3 RB750Gr3] ('''hEX v3''') - 5x GbE ports, 16/256MB, RouterOS L4 (6.36.1) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek MT7621A|MT7621A]] @880MHz Dual Core (MIPS 1004Kc V2.15) :1x USB 2.0, microSD Card slot, Flash (SPI), RAM Nanya (DDR3) :OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=6C:3B:6B 6C:3B:6B], "48RGEM02.0GALPC 1633" ([[WNC]]) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:61633-58 ''RB750Gr3'' on '''iXBT''' forums]
===Reviews=== *[http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-obnovlennogo-Mikrotik-hEX-RB750Gr3:-luchshiy-marshrutizator-po-sootnosheniyu-cena-kachestvo Review on '''LanMarket'''] *[http://weblance.com.ua/280-obzor-marshrutizatora-mikrotik-hex-rev3-rb750gr3-apparatnyy-ipsec-moschnyy-dvuyadernyy-processor-256-mb-operativki-i-podderzhka-dude-server.html Review on '''WebLance'''] --> ===See also=== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD M11 (RBM11G)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/m11g Product page] :Powerful small size OEM board with one GbE LAN and one miniPCIe slot :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A (@880MHz, 2 cores), 3G/LTE modem supports :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 256MB, 1x GbE LAN, 1x PCIe, 1x Mini SIM Card slot *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD M33 (RBM33G)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/rbm33g Product page] :Powerful OEM board with three GbE LAN and two miniPCIe slots :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A (@880MHz, 2 cores), USB 3.0, M.2 (Key M) :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 256MB, 3x GbE LAN, 2x PCIe, 2x Mini SIM Card slot *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX v3 (RB750Gr3)]] - ''Gigabit Ethernet Router''
==Images== *[https://img.routerboard.com/mimg/1340_hi_res.png PCB top]
